ImageFunction.colorRect

機能/意味
Rectangular translucent fill
タイプ
ImageFunctionクラスのメソッド
構文
colorRect(bmp, value, opa=255, rect=null, face=dfAlpha, cliprect=null)
引数
bmp 　Specifies the Bitmap object to fill.
value 　Specify the fill color and value.
　This value depends on the value of the face argument.
dfAlpha : Specify color in 0xRRGGBB format
dfAddAlpha : Specify color in 0xRRGGBB format
dfOpaque : Specify color in 0xRRGGBB format
dfMask : Specify the value of mask (opacity) (0 to 255)
　If dfOpaque is specified, the mask information will be ignored. If dfMask is specified, the color information will remain as it is.
　This argument is ignored for dfAlpha and if opa is negative.
opa 　Specifies the opacity to fill (-255 to 0 to 255).
　This argument is ignored if the value of face is dfMask or dfProvince (always completely opaque).
　Specifying a negative number is valid only when face is dfAlpha, in which case the value argument is ignored and opacity is removed from the image (specifying -255 makes the rectangle completely transparent).
rect 　The rectangle to fill, in pixels (at the image location), specified as a Rect object.
　If not specified, the entire target is used.
face 　Specify the drawing method.
If dfAlpha is specified, the image is assumed to be an image with an alpha channel and is drawn.
If dfAddAlpha is specified, the image will be considered as an image with an additional alpha channel and drawn.
If dfOpaque is specified, all images are assumed to be completely opaque and are drawn.
cliprect 　Specify the clipping area with a Rect object (at the bitmap image position).
　If not specified, the entire target is used.
戻り値
なし (void)
説明
　Fills the specified Bitmap image rectangle with the specified method.
　Unlike ImageFunction.fillRect, you can specify translucency and fill in translucent.
